processing_structure.text: Goal: Input one integer, output the sum of its divisors
Loop from 1 to the input value
For each number in the loop, check if it divides the input and add it to the sum

advice.text: You already listed main steps; double-check they match the task: sum of divisors.
Make sure the loop includes a conditional to test divisibility and add matching divisors to the sum.
Add a sub-comment under the loop like: 'for i from 1 to n: if i divides n, add i to sum' then translate each comment into code.
